item.title: Closest Binary Search Tree Value II
item.description: Closest Binary Search Tree Value II LeetCode #272 Description Given a non-empty binary search tree and a target value, find k values in the BST that are closest to the target. Note: Given target value is a floating point. You may assume k is always valid, that is: k â‰¤ total nodes. You are guaranteed to have only one unique set of k values in the BST that are closest to the target.
